author: CBC Radio
title: I got COVID-19 on the Diamond Princess cruise ship
description: Canadian John Craig Lee was travelling on the Diamond Princess when the ship was quarantined in Yokohama, south of Tokyo, in early February. During the 14-day quarantine, Lee also tested positive for the virus. After 50 days of being away from home, he finall…
content: John Craig Lee, a 72-year-old retired teacher from Richmond Hill, Ont., was travelling on the Diamond Princess when the cruise ship was quarantined in Yokohama, just south of Tokyo, in early February, after a former passenger was diagnosed with COVID-19 in Ho… [+4383 chars]
